title: 24: Bitcoin, Bubbles and Bulbs
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: In this episode we are joined by MBA Student Cruise Chen to talk about bitcoin and some of the rationales as to why people invest in it.  We also talk about economic bubbles and the history of how and why they form.  Hosted by Ceren Karacasu, Yudong Rao and David Just.
